posts.post_content:
FS: 1895 N300 Mayo

Bobby Lowe...1st player with 4 HRs in game...card has general wear, light wrinkle that shows only on back, edge wear, back also has what appears to be pencil "scribble", small piece of tape on top of card back, the white "stain" that shows at his left shoulder area is much "brighter" on picture than it actually appears on card...not bad card at all.....asking $SOLD

Jimmy Ryan...star of the day...HOF???....card has rough edges, especially at top, light crease at neck level, tape at top of card back...not too awful bad card.............asking $SOLD (see my post below)

***PM ONLY PLEASE...WILL ANSWER IN ORDER RECEIVED...***



Paypal preferred (Gift) and M/O accepted

Thanks for looking

Lowe

Ryan
[URL=http://s123.photobucket.com/user/wolfie70/media/D93428A2-1F5B-42E0-82F4-08CC579AC3BF-743-00000094894952B2_zpsf4835651.jpg.html][IMG]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o313/wolfie70/D93428A2-1F5B-42E0-82F4-08CC579AC3BF-743-00000094894952B2_zpsf4835651.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s123.photobucket.com/user/wolfie70/media/7B7FFBC1-FC17-49BA-8F7E-B48609726483-743-000000949AE01135_zpscaf0cbdf.jpg.html][IMG]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o313/wolfie70/7B7FFBC1-FC17-49BA-8F7E-B48609726483-743-000000949AE01135_zpscaf0cbdf.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

OK folks, had a question regarding the Ryan card on if it measured correctly. I measured the card several times under good light (I'm going blind I think...dern computers and price guides), anyway, IMHO I don't believe the card was intentionally trimmed BUT it it borderline short top/bottom (I had never measured it before) by around 1/32"-1/16"... I firmly believe the shortness is due to the excessive wear at top of card (see picture).....not from scissors....(why trim a card on only one side when it has wear like this on all four sides?????) Anyway, with that said, I will drop price to $SOLD(thats what I paid around ten years ago)

So....The N300 Ryan.....$SOLD to first response via PM
